archimate:Requirement.name: 4.23.2 System Development Mandatory Requirements Control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Business requirements should cover the need for confidentiality, integrity and availability of information throughout its lifecycle, including: a) creation (e.g. input validation and classifi-cation) b) processing (e.g. integrity checking and per-formance) c) storage (e.g. location and access control) d) transmission (e.g. source and destination checking) e) destruction (e.g. secure erasure and physi-cal destruction).
